name: @bjankord/style-guide-boilerplate
description: A tool for crafting living style guides.

scripts.release:major: npm test && npm version major -m "Released version %s" && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm version minor -m "Released version %s" && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm version patch -m "Released version %s" && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags

author: Brett Jankord
